Prerequisites: PREREQUISITE: ACG 2021 OR APA 1251 OR CONSENT OF THE INSTRUCTOR
Course Description: THIS COURSE IS INTENDED FOR STUDENTS DESIRING A WORKING KNOWLEDGE OF COMPUTERIZED ACCOUNTING USING MICROCOMPUTER SOFTWARE. THE FIVE MAJOR SYSTEMS COMMONLY FOUND IN COMPUTERIZED ACCOUNTING ENVIRONMENTS ARE COVEREDGENERAL LEDGER, DEPRECIATION, ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE, ACCOUNTS PAYABLE, AND PAYROLL.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
